name: Den of Spies
description:
This interactive generative piece began as an experiment about using the Hicdex as an entry gate to a piece. The subject matter is based around NftBiker's comment on Twitter that "Live feed is a nest of spies..." (https://twitter.com/nftbiker/status/1436642675298652160?s=21)

Due to Hicdex instability, the gating code was removed and the piece is now available to all as if they were the owner. Previously, only owners would be allowed to click the door and view the gallery.

Now, everybody can visit the Den of Spies! 

Instructions:

Pressing the SPACE BAR returns you to the door.

Tap/click to open the door. 

Once you are viewing the spies, double-click/tap to refresh the view and generate new spies. On mobile, tap once to attract attention to a new location.

The eyes track the mouse position.
